LOUKRAKPAM RISHIDEV SINGH 
Enterprise Architect 

  7428717903      RL.RISHIDEVL@GMAIL.COM 

  www.linkedin.com/in/rishidev-loukrakpam-69a05216    New Delhi, India 

 

SUMMARY  

 
Strategic and innovative Enterprise Architect with extensive experience in 

modernizing legacy systems, designing scalable architectures, and leading cross-

functional teams to deliver transformative IT solutions. With a proven track record of 

architecting enterprise-grade systems, I specialize in aligning technology strategies 

with business objectives, leveraging expertise in .NET Core, Angular, Kafka, Redis, and 

distributed systems. My leadership ensures secure, high-performing, and 

maintainable solutions that drive organizational growth and success. 

EXPERIENCE  
 

 
Enterprise Architect 

Acro Technologies India Private Ltd. 
      02/2019 - Present          New Delhi  
 

• Led the modernization of a legacy Vendor Management System (XRM) by 
transitioning it to a Modular Monolith Hybrid Architecture with .NET Core Web 
API and Angular. 
 

• Designed & Implemented several Microservices & Framework for API Gateway 
using Ocelot, Authentication Mechanism (Form, Token, Auth0, SSO), Localization 
Service, Distributed Cache Service, 3rd Party Integration Service, Bulk Upload 
Service, Background Service, Central Document Management Service, Email 
Processing Service, Logging Service, Messaging Queue Service with Kafka. 
 

• Designed and developed a comprehensive Code Generation Application, 
automating the creation of essential .NET Core framework classes and reducing 
development timelines. 
 

• Built an in-house Test Automation Framework using Java and Selenium, enabling 
integration, smoke, and regression testing. 

 

• Migrated the Juvenile Detention Centre Management Application "SARA" from 
Java and JSP to JSF with Hibernate and PrimeFaces UI, improving maintainability, 
user experience, and performance. 
 

• Conducted a comprehensive security audit of the "SARA" application, identifying 
and mitigating vulnerabilities to ensure compliance with security standards. 
 

• Designed and developed a GenAI RAG Application using Cohere, OpenAI LLMs, 
and Hugging Face sentence-transformer to streamline access to architecture and 
framework guidelines, empowering developers with efficient search and 
retrieval of documentation. 
 

• Established a Centre of Excellence (CoE) with senior developers for R&D, 
architecture enhancement, and technical support. 
 

CERTIFICATION  

Microsoft Certified Azure Developer 
Associate 

Microsoft Certified Azure Developer 
Associate.

Azure Solution Architect certification.

certification.

certification.

Participation certification. 
 
 

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS  

 
Vendor Management System 
Modernization 

Led the successful modernization of critical 
legacy systems, resulting in improved 
operational efficiency and developer 
productivity. 

 

Hybrid Architecture Design 

Architected a scalable, modular hybrid 
system integrating API Gateway, 
Authentication/Authorization, distributed 
caching, and asynchronous messaging 
using Kafka, enabling seamless scalability 
and enhanced system performance. 
 

In-House Test Automation 
Framework 

Developed a robust test automation 
framework with Java and Selenium, 
enabling integration, smoke, and regression 
testing, resulting in significantly reduced 
testing time and enhanced quality 
assurance. 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/rishidev-loukrakpam-69a05216


• Implemented CICD pipelines using TFS for various applications like Web API, 
ASP.NET MVC, Angular streamlining deployment processes across Dev, QA, SIT, 
UAT, and Production environments. 

• Enhanced application security by mitigating OWASP vulnerabilities and 
conducting proactive audits using ZAP, Burp Suite, and SonarQube. 
 

• Improved API and front-end performance with distributed caching, async calls, 
lazy loading, and GZIP compression. 
 

• Trained over 100 developers and leads on .NET Core, ORM, Angular, and Secure 
Coding, Agile practices through hands-on workshops and sessions. 
 

• Taken 100s of interviews and help onboarding many potential candidates. 
 

 
IT Operation Manager 
Sangai Technologies India Private Ltd. 
       2015 – 2018                     Manipur 

 

• Managed multiple end-to-end projects, from bidding and requirement gathering 
to development and release cycles, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with 
business goals. 
 

• Spearheaded the development and deployment of key applications: 
o Hospital Management System: Designed and developed using Java 

technology to streamline hospital operations. 
o e-Thabak: An online job portal connecting recruiters and job seekers, built 

with ASP.NET MVC. 
o Find In Manipur: A government smart city initiative geo-location mobile app 

enabling users to find essential places like hospitals, gas stations, schools, 
and ATMs. Developed with: 

o Backend: Node.js Web API and MongoDB database. 
o Android App: Java. 
o iOS App: Swift. 

 

• Established and enforced IT policies like Acceptable Use Policy (AUP), Password 
Policy, Remote Access Policy, Procedures, and best practices to ensure system 
reliability and security. 

 

• Coordinated cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure smooth 
execution and delivery of IT projects. 

 

 
Sr. Programmer Analyst 
Acro Technologies India Private Ltd. 
       2010 – 2015                     Manipur 

 

• Migrated the legacy Vendor Management System (VMS) from Classic ASP with 
C# and VBScript to ASP.NET 3.5 with C# for backend and ASPX, JavaScript, and 
jQuery for frontend. 
 

• Optimized application performance by converting in-line queries and business 
logic into stored procedures and views, ensuring improved security and 
execution efficiency. 

 

• Upgraded UI components by replacing ASP.NET controls with Telerik ASP.NET 
jQuery UI controls, implementing pagination, load-on-demand techniques, and 
optimized ViewState management. 

 

• Secured the application against vulnerabilities such as SQL Injection, session 
hijacking, and local storage exploitation through parameterized queries, 
encrypted uploads, and secure cache management. 

 

Dynamic Code Generation 
Application 

Developed a Code Generation Application 
to automate the creation of essential VMS 
architecture classes, ensuring compliance 
with standards and accelerating 
development cycles with plug-and-play 
functionality. 

 

GenAI RAG Application 

 

Developed a GenAI RAG (Retrieve-and-
Generate) application leveraging Cohere, 
OpenAI LLMs, and Hugging Face sentence-
transformer, enabling developers to 
efficiently search and access architecture 
and framework guidelines for both backend 
and frontend development. 
 

Centre of Excellence (CoE) 

Establishment 

Established and mentored a Centre of 

Excellence (CoE) team, upskilling 

developers in .NET Core, ORM, and 

Angular, ensuring seamless adoption of 

new technologies. 

 

Application Security Enhancement 

Enhanced application security by 

identifying and mitigating OWASP 

vulnerabilities, implementing encryption, 

hashing, and proactive audits using tools 

like SonarQube and ZAP. 

 

System Performance Optimization 
Improved system performance through 
distributed caching, API optimization, and 
lazy loading, validated by comprehensive 
performance testing with JMeter. 
 
 

COMPETENCIES  
 
 

Architectural Strategy and 
Implementation 

 
Technical Leadership 

 
Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) 
Management

Security and Compliance Leadership 

 



 

 

• Developed an innovative dynamic module-generation system, enabling runtime 
UI control generation and database-driven configuration for business logic and 
screens. 

 

• Provided technical support to over five clients, resolving bugs and addressing 
queries within an SLA of 1–2 hours during night shifts, while serving as a lead for 
the development team during day shifts. 

 

• Led a team of 20 members, overseeing the development and enhancement of 
the VMS system, ensuring timely delivery of client requirements and maintaining 
system stability. 

 

• Collaborated directly with clients to gather requirements, coordinate queries, 
and implement enhancements, demonstrating effective client management and 
communication skills. 

 

Associate DBA 
RJ Enterprise 
       2009 (8 Months)              Manipur 

 

• Developed a Windows Form Application with VB for managing commodities for 
a whole-seller enterprise, utilizing MSSQL and Microsoft Access as backend 
databases. 
 

• Managed and maintained the database, ensuring data integrity and 
performance.
